runs.comm: that's much too wide outside off stump, the batsmen doesn't bother going after it
good length, pitching on middle from over the wicket, Jamshed stays in his crease and defends to the bowler
defended from the crease towards cover
steered off the back foot behind point for a single
good length on off and middle, Shehzad moves across and works the ball through square for a single
again the length is excellent on a tight line, Jamshed comes forward and blocks
a bit too straight this time and Jamshed whips the ball in front of square, Gambhir gives chase
good length outside off, punched from the crease towards cover
punched off the back foot towards the bowler
lots of width and much too short, Shehzad stands tall and slaps the ball hard through cover
this time he tries to run the ball to third man but misses
takes that from outside off and closes the face to play the ball towards midwicket
good length just outside off, defended on the off side
Jamshed jumps down the track and flays at a length ball, hitting it hard towards point, where a fumble allows a couple of runs
there are three men in that point region and Jamshed's cut finds one of them, the length was a bit too short from Bhuvneshwar
good length and straight, Jamshed nudges towards mid-on for a single
Shehzad walks across his stumps and flicks the ball from outside off towards deep backward square

is that a six? I thought he mis-hit it high in the air! Jamshed came down the track and seemed to be beaten by the change of pace. It was the slower ball. But he went through with his shot and timed it well enough to clear the long off boundary.
deftly steered past the fielder at short third man for a boundary, Pakistan have got going
that's huge! A rubbish ball, too short, and it stood up for Shehzad, who pulled with tremendous power. That travelled some 99 metres
fuller length and straight, nudged towards mid-on for a single
good length around off stump, Jamshed stays in his crease and defends towards point
a slower ball outside off stump and Jamshed fails to make contact, it was in the blockhole too
Jamshed moves forward and lifts the ball off his pads over square leg, flicking it from middle to the square leg boundary
pushed towards mid off for a single
too short and there's width too, Jamshed stays in his crease and drives with power through cover, it's a packed off side but he found the gap in the in field
Jamshed meets him by stepping out of his crease and driving a length ball past mid-off for a consecutive boundary
Dinda replies with a short ball and Jamshed sways out of the way
a second short ball and this time Jamshed pulls along the ground towards deep square leg, Ashwin goofs up a one-handed pick-up
Shehzad pulls a length ball and hits it to mid-on

too full and Shehzad launches the ball over extra cover, staying in his crease and using a lot of bottom hand in the shot. This is a cracking start from Pakistan's openers. Right up there with the asking rate.
nudged off the pads behind square, Pakistan reach 50 inside the fielding restrictions
glanced off the pads towards short fine leg
makes room by moving outside leg side and pulls through midwicket
Ashin paused for what seemed like ages in the middle of his delivery stride, Shehzad sweeps towards deep backward square
worked off the pads behind square
it's like someone presses a pause button as Ashwin runs in, and then hits play to let his action unfold. Shehzad isn't fooled by the gimmicks and sweeps to deep square again
quick that was, Shehzad goes back to defend on the off side
too short and wide, Shehzad tries to blast it through cover point but misses
worked off the pads towards deep square leg
fired into the pads from round the wicket, Jamshed stays back and turns the ball towards deep backward square for two more
flicked through midwicket for a single
driven to extra cover, a bit of a yes-no between the batsmen but they run the single safely in the end
Shehzad unfurls the reverse sweep and hits the ball from leg stump through point, Ashwin bowled that from round the wicket
now he pauses mid-action to see if Jamshed will make a move too early, he doesn't. Worked off the pads through midwicket
a loud appeal for lbw after Shehzad misses the sweep but that was missing off stump
Shehzad moves outside leg a bit too early, Ashwin follows him, and the batsman sweeps
Jamshed moves outside leg stump this time and drives on the off side
played off the front foot towards midwicket
only one off the first ball, played to long on from the crease
Shehzad lines him up, skipping out of his crease and lofting straight over the bowler's head, he hit that flat and placed it perfectly
punched towards mid-on, Raina tries to move to his right to stop the ball but Jamshed is in the way
the batsman steps out and Raina fires the ball into the pads, it hits the leg and goes towards short fine leg
played towards deep midwicket for a single
Dhoni collects down leg side and appeals confidently for a catch. The umpire doesn't call it wide either. So maybe it hit the pad or Dhoni's ploy to throw the umpire off worked
the attempted reverse sweep does not come off, Shehzad gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye
dropped, Jamshed tries to heave the ball as it angles into him over midwicket but gets an edge that misses leg stump, Dhoni fails to catch it
played to long on for a single
comes down the track and works the ball through midwicket

Ashwin's funny action works! That was much slower and delivered with a bit of a round-arm action. The ball, in the end, was a bit short and a bit wide. Jamshed had to reach for it and ended up connecting with the toe of his bat, giving point a simple catch
tries to sweep but misses and hit on the pad
Akmal charges and swings hard, carting the ball far over the long-on boundary. A bit of payback from Pakistan
Akmal charges again, Yuvraj pitches a bit shorter, Akmal taps the ball through midwicket
driven off the front foot towards long off
a fuller and quicker ball, Akmal waits in his crease and square drives through point

stumped! Motera erupts as Dhoni whips off the bails. Shehzad charged Yuvraj, who saw the batsman coming and fired the ball quick and cramped the right-hander for room. Shehzad swung but missed, he didn't even bother trying to get back into his crease. Good take from Dhoni, moved down leg side to collect.
tight line and length on middle stump, Hafeez punches towards the off side, Yuvraj does the fielding himself
length ball outside off, steered from the crease to third man

what a shot that is! Hafeez moved towards the off side and scooped the full ball over short fine leg, it landed on the advertisement thingys that substitute for a boundary rope. Or maybe just short. The third umpire signals four. Looked like six to me.
driven to cover for a single
tries to slog over midwicket but ends up mis-timing it towards long on
pushed from the crease in front of point for a single
the slower ball but it's a bit too wide outside off, the umpire calls it even though it's just inisde the tram line

Hafeez gets down on one knee and tries to swat a slower ball that's full as well, he gets a top edge that goes right over Dhoni's head. The keeper and two other fielders try to reach the catch but it falls safe in the long stop region
too full and a bit too quick to cut but Akmal manages to get it away towards point
cut deftly and late, from right in front of off stump and to the third man boundary, Pakistan go past 100
makes room and lofts the ball over cover point
Akmal gives Yuvraj the charge, the bowler drops it shorter, Akmal pulls through midwicket
powerful drive, he comes down the track again, gets to the pitch of the ball and drills hit hard between the stumps and the non-striker. The boundary riders had no chance
Akmal steps out of his crease and pulls towards cow corner, deep midwicket and long-on converge on the ball
shot! Hafeez backs away by moving outside leg stump, Ashwin follows him but Hafeez is good enough to clear his front leg and cart the ball over deep midwicket
and again! Hafeez clears his front leg to create room against Ashwin's round the stumps line and slogs the ball flat over deep midwicket
pulled off the back foot behind square
Akmal waits for Ashwin to pause and then deliver, he defends to the bowler
in the blockhole and Akmal works it through midwicket
a low full toss on leg stump, Hafeez moves outside leg to drive it through cover

in the slot for the drive and Hafeez drills it through extra cover, the fielder at long off runs to his left and dives full length but can't save the four. Dinda's second over begins like his first did
this time Hafeez takes the length ball from outside off and laps it to the backward square leg boundary. Dhoni goes up to have a chat to his bowler
nearly in the blockhole with a bit of swing, Hafeez digs it out towards midwicket
in the blockhole outside off stump, played towards cover for just a single
a slower ball on off stump, Hafeez slogs towards midwicket but can't beat the fielder, a dot ball
good length on off stump, Hafeez hits it to long on
tremendous shot! A length delivery and Hafeez made room by moving towards leg, clearing his front leg and lofting the ball flat over the extra cover boundary
a fuller ball outside off and Hafeez drives though cover
a slower ball outside off, Akmal slashes and gets a thick outside edge, Dinda runs to his left from third man to field
full outside off, Hafeez squeezes it out towards third man
a full toss on off and middle, driven firmly to cover where Ashwin fields and misses the stumps at the bowler's end
the batsman comes out of his crease and is yorked by the ball just outside off stump, Dhoni collects and underarms the ball quickly to prevent a bye
a low full toss and it's hit hard to cover, where Ashwin fumbles, but the batsmen don't run. Hafeez wanted the run
the stumps have been demolished. Dinda delivered a slower ball on middle and leg. Akmal had finished heaving across the line by the time it arrived and heard it smash into middle and leg stumps.
Afridi gets off the mark by pulling a short ball flat over the in field and into the gap on the cow corner boundary. He didn't have a good day with the ball, can he have a good one with the bat?
Afridi tries to blast the ball through cover but gets a bottom edge through to Dhoni, it pitched soon after hitting the bat
driven hard along the ground to cover
in the blockhole, dug out to long-on, so just six runs off the over when the asking rate is nearly double
a slower ball on a good length outside off, Hafeez tries to launch it over extra cover, hitting inside out, but connects with nothing

another slower ball, this time Hafeez was ready and he smashed it straight and hard, forcing the umpire to get out of the way. The ball curved in the air like a baseball pitch and screamed to the boundary. He brings up a superb half century
another slower ball, played towards long on
that's high in the air and far enough! Afridi simply slogged, clearing his front foot and swinging hard, he connected and cleared wide long-on
a full toss but Afridi's hit it straight to Rohit at long off! A loose delivery that was but Afridi did not place it, he hit it flat and Rohit caught it well inside the boundary
superb placement from Hafeez! Third man is in the circle and he knew that, openign the face late to steer the length ball between short third man and backward point
a slower ball around off, Kamran Akmal makes room and drives through extra cover. 25 needed off 11.

Dinda's bowling a superb spell at the death! He follows up that six-run over with the wicket of Hafeez. He tried to clear the wide long-on boundary but mis-timed the shot. Raina came running in from the boundary and took the catch
a slower ball and Akmal waits for it, slashing it hard to the point boundary, Pakistan throw a counter-punch

caught on the extra cover boundary! Akmal lofts the full ball inside out and connects well. But Kohli runs quickly to his left from long-off, covering a lot of ground to reach the ball and take the catch on the move. India are taking control of the end game
Malik can only play the ball to point for a single, Pakistan need much more
in the blockhole to finish, Gul digs it out on the leg side, Dinda's done a supreme job for his team
a low full toss, which Malik drives to long off, he didn't quite get under it and he loses the strike
a full ball outside off stump, just inside the tram line, Gul swings and misses, the batsmen don't attempt a bye
in the slot outside off and Gul drives with power, finding the gap on the cover boundary. Pakistan need 15 from three.
in the blockhole, Gul can only drive it to long off for a single, India will win if Ishant can bowl two more legal balls
another delivery on the blockhole, Malik drives to cover, Kohli raises his arms and does a little jig in the outfield
that's a wide outside off stump, so India and Motera have to wait a minute longer
caught at deep point! Gul threw his bat at a length ball and sliced it over the infield. Rahane ran in from the deep to hold the catch. India get home by 11 runs to level the series 1-1.
